name: DaeColor
author: DaeVision.com

sections.installation:
Follow the steps below to install the plugin.

  1. Download DaeColor.zip
  2. Upload it into your wordpress plugins directory,or Login to your wordpress and go to plugins ==> add new and upload the zip file into there
  3. Activate the plugin
  4. Voila at the begining of your posts there will be a colored block and the category that the post is listed in. The color of the block is determined/generated by the name of your category.

Instructions to Change the CSS

  1. Go to your plugins page on wordpress
  2. find the daecolor plugin
  3. click on edit
  4. on the right hand side click on the style.css file for the daecolor plugin
  5. edit away ( http://www.sflchronicle.com is using it and has done some pretty cool css to it. )

Settings Instructions

  1. To get to the settings page, login to your wordpress backend
  2. Go to settings => DaeColor settings
  3. Here you will see the list of your current categories and their corresponding colors.
  4. Here you can also modify the algorithm used to generate the colors and see real time the effect on your categories.
  5. Also you can select to have the DaeColor box appear before your post or manual placement.
  6. To save changes made, click the “the colors duke! the colors!” box

Advanced Instructions (for manual insertion)
